name: MPM_ATTRIB_REGISTRY
description: This table contains data about registries that are attributed to patients for My Panel Metrics.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID
columns.description: The HFR ID of a registry attributed to the patient for the purpose of My Panel Metrics.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.

columns.name: MEASURE_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: Measure groups attributed to registries for this patient for the purpose of My Panel Metrics.
